security: This document details the allocation of funds for sensitive operations, including "Propaganda" and "Clandestineness." Disclosing specific amounts allocated to these activities could expose operational methods and compromise ongoing efforts to influence events related to Cuba.  Quoting directly: "Annox \"II\" : Propaganda 20,000.00" and "Annox \"III\" : Clandestineness. 25,000.00"
summary: This document is an analysis of deposits and expenses for a budget totaling $81,500 related to activities concerning Cuba, covering the period from July 1 to 31, 1962.
summary_one_paragraph: The document provides a financial overview of expenses and deposits made in July 1962, allocated from an $81,500 budget for Cuban-related activities. It details spending across four categories: Delegations (Special), Propaganda, Clandestineness, and Judicatura Cubana Democrática. The analysis includes beginning balances, deposits, July expenses, and ending balances for each category, with specific line items indicating payments for travel, radio programs, underground activities, and support for the Judicatura Cubana Democrática.
title: Analysis of Deposits for Expenses Out of the $81,500.00 Budget
persons_mentioned: Miguel F. Marquez de la Cerra
